ThermostatError.ErrorCode1: No adaptation possible. Device correctly mounted on radiator?
ThermostatError.ErrorCode2: Valve stroke too short or battery power too low. Open and close valve tappet several times by hand or Insert new batteries.
ThermostatError.ErrorCode3: No valve movement possible. Valve tappet free?
ThermostatError.ErrorCode4: The installation is currently being prepared
ThermostatError.ErrorCode5: The radiator controller is in installation mode and can be mounted on the heating valve
ThermostatError.ErrorCode6: The radiator controller now adapts to the stroke of the heating valve

Message.ServerCrashed: Internal fritzbox error - please restart your fritzbox ( update to 7.20 required )
Message.SendDebugData: You are about to send debug information. This information contains a list of all connected DECT devices
Message.SendSuccess: Information was successfully logged. Please submit a diagnostic report
Message.FixLogin: Invalid login credentials - please update the stored login credentials in the app settings

Bridge.Title: Bridge configuration
Bridge.AllowMultiple: Allow to add same device multiple times

Infos.Title: Information
Infos.Permission: A additional user account is required (System->FRITZ!Box-User). Login require the "Smart Home" permission. Data query additionally require the "FRITZ!Box-Settings" permission
